definition: form or accumulate steadily, gradual improvement or growth or development
details:
verb
- form or accumulate steadily
= synonyms: build, work up, build up
- move forward, also in the metaphorical sense
= synonyms: advance, go on, pass on, move on, march on
- develop in a positive way
= example: develop in a positive way
= synonyms: advance, come along, get along, shape up, get on, come on
noun
- gradual improvement or growth or development
= synonyms: advancement
- the act of moving forward (as toward a goal)
= synonyms: advancement
- a movement forward
= example: a movement forward
= synonyms: progression, advance
